message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price for both of us, and I believe you'll see the value in this product. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $9,800 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is a fair compromise.  This is a one-time offer, so let's finalize this deal!
I'm close to walking away, but I really like the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,250. Can you consider this compromise?
